charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO MANUFACTURE AND POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA, A SCHEDULE I CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, IN VIOLATION OF 21 USC 841(a)(1)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty; Imprisonment, 120 months to run concurrently; Supervised Release, 5 years; Special Assessment, $300.00
